title: rreggiar.github.io
text:
roman reggiardo, PhD
building with biology and computers (and occasionally soap dispensers), liquid biopsy @ UC Santa Cruz and ClearNote, now more molecular engineering @ Stanford

projects
building better RNAs and figuring out why they work
ancient, repetitive RNA is abundant and potentially diagnostic
mutant KRAS leads to remarkable regulatory overhaul in lung cancer, so does treatment – scholar –
